name: Bone Devil
description: The Bone Devil is a tall, skeletal fiend with a long, barbed tail and wings made of bony spines, giving it a gaunt and terrifying appearance.
memorable: Bone Devils thrive on causing pain and suffering, often overseeing torture and demonstrating cunning and brute strength in combat.
goals: To torment souls and enforce the will of its infernal masters.
relations: May command lesser devils and interact with other fiends in the Nine Hells.
environment: Typically found in the Nine Hells, overseeing domains of suffering.
strengths: Highly resilient, with resistances to nonmagical damage, immunity to fire and poison, and notable magical resistance.
weaknesses: Some reliance on melee attacks may hinder effectiveness against ranged opponents.
attacks: Utilizes a barbed spear for piercing damage, claws for slashing damage, and a venomous sting that can poison victims.
most_powerful_ability: Devilish Command allows it to compel others to act against their will.
senses: Has Devil's Sight, allowing it to see through magical darkness.
skills: Skilled in athletics, deception, insight, perception, and stealth, with particularly high proficiency.
additional_information: Can become invisible, making it difficult to target.
Features a Lawful Evil aura which enhances its manipulative nature.
Inflicts agonizing pain through its sting attack.
Can grapple targets with its barbed spear.
Possesses high Charisma, aiding in manipulation and commanding authority.
test_queries: devil with piercing claws and venomous sting
bone creature from the Nine Hells
